RXN_license.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Defines the license management functions.

The license management interface provides an interface to validate the use of the RxN software and available functions.

Since:
3.0.0

Function Documentation

void RXN_Get_License_Expiry_Date ( char  expiryDate[RXN_CONSTANT_MAX_LICENSE_EXPIRY_DATE_LENGTH]  ) 

Get the expiry time of the license key in ASCII text.

Parameters:
expiryDate [OUT] A memory location to be filled with the expiry date. This is a null terminated string and is at most RXN_CONSTANT_MAX_LICENSE_EXPIRY_DATE_LENGTH (50) characters long.

This function returns the expiry date in "YYYY-MM-DD UTC" format. If no license key was provided, this function will return a null terminated empty string.

Applicable Standards
Proprietary to GPStream (tm) PGPS (tm) client software, SAGPS (tm) client software.

Since:
3.0.0
See also:
RXN_Set_License_Key()
RXN_Is_License_Valid()
U16 RXN_Is_License_Valid ( const U32  time  ) 

Validates the license key being used against the specified time.

Parameters:
time [IN] The current time in GPS seconds.
Returns:
RXN_SUCCESS If the function completes successfully.
RXN_FAIL If the function fails.

This function will validate if the user supplied key is valid for the specified time. Typically, the user will pass in the current GPS time for validation.

Applicable Standards
Proprietary to GPStream (tm) PGPS (tm) client software, SAGPS (tm) client software.

Since:
3.0.0
See also:
RXN_Set_License_Key()
RXN_Get_License_Expiry_Date()
U16 RXN_Set_License_Key ( const char *  license_key,
const U32  license_key_length,
const char *  vendor_id 
)

Provide the license key to the library.

Parameters:
license_key [IN] The pointer to a block of memory containing the license key.
license_key_length [IN] The length of the license key.
vendor_id [IN] The vendor specific id.
Returns:
RXN_SUCCESS If the function completes successfully.
RXN_FAIL If the function fails.

Applicable Standards
Proprietary to GPStream (tm) PGPS (tm) client software, SAGPS (tm) client software.

Attention:
This function must be called with a valid key before RXN_Generate_Assistance() and RXN_Get_Ephemeris() can be used.
Since:
3.0.0
See also:
